recipe.title: Teriyaki Chicken And Mushroom Skewers Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 lb ; boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch (2 1/2cm) pieces ; (400 g)
6 skewers ; bamboo skewer, soaked in water

steps.step: In a large bowl, place the chicken soy sauce, honey, sesame seeds, and spring onion. Stir well, refrigerate and marinade for at least 2 hours.
On soaked bamboo sticks, skewer on the chicken and mushrooms. Repeat until the skewer is full.
On a coal BBQ, cook the chicken skewers for 3-4 minutes a side until the chicken is cooked through and the skewers are golden brown.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a large bowl, place the chicken soy sauce, honey, sesame seeds, and spring onion.
Stir well, refrigerate and marinade for at least 2 hours.
On soaked bamboo sticks, skewer on the chicken and mushrooms.
Repeat until the skewer is full.
On a coal BBQ, cook the chicken skewers for 3-4 minutes a side until the chicken is cooked through and the skewers are golden brown.
